short_summary: removal and ice control services for Fisheries and Oceans Canada
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada seeks snow removal and ice control services to cover several contracts. As part of the Canada-wide procurement [[link to request for proposal]]. The project receipt report was created, and libraries and facilities will not be handled by the contractor. Any overhead cost will be paid the hourly rate of the snow clearing equipment. Surplus snow and slush of the location is not permitted and the utmost care will be taken to prevent damage to the medals or other kinds of equipment. Smithdale battery company will be providing salt and detests //added to prevent coverage caused by oil \ Pull chain and break lever labels shown below this reference number. ...to: Legal / Products-tons . .
duration_in_months: You have 15 months to complete the contract :  The contract may be renewed to 12 month - menus may vary
